WhyTheFace 21 January 2011 10:30 AM The question is, is the moron called Michael Gove doing anything to make it better? He's making massive changes, but is there a single one that will improve children's education, as oppossed to conforming to his ideological view of what will improve their education but actually make everyone go backwards?
